com.unvired.ump.attachment

Interface IAttachmentService


  • public interface IAttachmentService
    IAttachmentService provides the interface for an application to interact with the platform to process attachments. Applications can create, update and search for attachments using this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAttachment addAttachment(AttachmentMeta attachmentMeta)
      Create an attachment handle using the metadata provided by the application
      boolean deleteAttachmentByExternalReference(java.lang.String externalReference)
      Delete an attachment by using the user specified external reference
      boolean deleteAttachmentByID(java.lang.String attachmentID)
      Delete an attachment by using the attachment ID
      java.util.List<IAttachment> getAttachmentByExternalReference(java.lang.String externalReference)
      Get an attachment handle using the user specified external reference
      IAttachment getAttachmentByID(java.lang.String attachmentID)
      Get an attachment handle using the attachment ID

      Load an attachment in the cache directly from a stream object
